recipesJson.name: 3 2 1 blue raspberry
recipesJson.author: Dmixer256
recipesJson.description: This is a simple and delicious blue raspberry. The LB blue raspberry and the WF sour Blue Raspberry is a great combo. The WF boysenberry raspberry gives it that extra stickiness. I don't think I have seen a simple blue razz with this exact combo. Mix it up and tell me what you think.
